mapper.select:
select
from jiarushetuan where shenqingren = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from jiarushetuan where 1=1 and yonghuming like concat('%',#{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanmingcheng like concat('%',#{shetuanmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanleixing like concat('%',#{shetuanleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingren like concat('%',#{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingliyou like concat('%',#{shenqingliyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from jiarushetuan where 1=1
and shenqingren =#{shenqingren}

select from jiarushetuan where 1=1 and yonghuming like concat('%',#{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanmingcheng like concat('%',#{shetuanmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shetuanleixing like concat('%',#{shetuanleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingren like concat('%',#{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingliyou like concat('%',#{shenqingliyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into jiarushetuan
id,
yonghuming, xingming, shetuanmingcheng, shetuanleixing, shenqingren, shenqingliyou,
addtime,

#{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update jiarushetuan
yonghuming = #{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingming = #{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shetuanmingcheng = #{shetuanmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shetuanleixing = #{shetuanleixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenqingren = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenqingliyou = #{shenqingliyou,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
